name: propose_reading_list
description: Propose a short, staged reading or study path across Sartre, Nietzsche, Camus, Dostoevsky, Emerson, and Jefferson for a given topic.

topic.description: Theme or question, e.g., 'AI autonomy', 'moral responsibility', 'decentralized governance', 'meaning in work'.

max_items.description: Maximum number of works or thinkers to recommend.
